title: Android Messages: How to view/download photos from laptop's app?
content:
I have a Pixel 3 and a Acer Spin 13 Chromebook running their respective most updated versions of OS.
  I am currently out-of-country and connected to the same WIFI network on both devices.
Photos will not download to my phone, however I can get texts.
I have the messenger app connected to my Chromebook, and I cannot seem to get the photos to load there either.  When I try to "Save-As" it comes up as an mhtml file. When I open that file it just loops back into the messenger, but displays as empty.
Is there a way to get my photos view-able?
Is there a way to change the file type from my end to be able to download?
   Thanks for your help :)
